/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. In the distance, a highway overpass stretches across the frame, a testament to the city's bustling infrastructure. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
